meta.title: Alert
meta.description: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages.

props.description: When set, enables the dismiss close button
Value for the 'aria-label' attribute on the dismiss button
When set, shows the alert. Set to a number (seconds) to show and automatically dismiss the alert after the number of seconds has elapsed

events.description: Alert dismissed either via the dismiss close button or when the dismiss countdown has expired
When prop show is a number, this event emits every second on countdown.
Used to update the v-model show value

args.description: Boolean state of alert, or Number for current countdown value
